data.comment: Chris Hughton (Nottingham) has taken off Jack Colback who seemed to be grimacing with pain earlier. A possible injury. Harry Arter is the replacement.
In the minute 43, Swansea's Connor Roberts scores with his head to give his side a 0-1 lead.
The first half has been concluded at City Ground.
In the minute 51, Harry Arter (Nottingham) gets a yellow card.
Joe Lolley is replacing Miguel Angel Guerrero for the home team.
At City Ground, Tobias Figueiredo has been yellow-carded for the home team.
In the minute 76, Chris Hughton is making the team's third substitution at City Ground with Will Swan replacing Sammy Ameobi.
Scott McKenna is booked for the home team.
Wayne Routledge is on a sub for Jamal Lowe for Swansea.
In the minute 87, Freddie Woodman for Swansea has been booked by Tony Harrington and receives a first yellow card.
Jay Fulton (Swansea) has received a yellow card from Tony Harrington.
That's full-time at City Ground. The final score is 0-1.
Nottingham's Lyle Taylor has been booked in Nottingham.
